explains: n. 赦免；无罪开释；履行；尽职；（债务等的）清偿

sentences.en: The jury voted 8-to-4 in favour of acquittal.
sentences.cn: 该陪审团以8票比4票投票赞成无罪判决。

sentences.en: The case resulted in an acquittal.
sentences.cn: 此案件最终作出无罪判决。

sentences.en: The Washington Times this week called for Mr Wilders's acquittal.
sentences.cn: 本周的华盛顿时报呼吁将威尔德斯无罪释放。
